text: læa cea cng tadsin rahwang phwk khea dwy sing thi xallxh di thrng prathan lng ma theid læa cng xya ptibati tam khwam khır fıta khxng phwk khea læa cng rawang phwk khea nı kar thi phwk khea ca cungcı cea hı khew xxk cak bang sing thi xallxh di thrng prathan lng ma kæ cea læw tha hak phwk cea phinhlanghı k phung ru theid wa thæ cring xallxh nan pheiyng prasngkh ca hı prasb kæ phwk khea sung bang swn hæng thosʹ khxng phwk khea theanan læa thæcring canwn makmay nı hmu mnusʹy nan pen phu lameid
